title: Strawberry GraphQL types for User and Skill
description: Implement `app/graphql/types/user.py` with UserType Strawberry type. Fields: id, email, username, display_name, avatar_url, headline, primary_role, timezone, availability_status, builder_score, bio, contact_links, github_username, onboarding_completed, created_at. Add lazy resolver fields for skills â†’ list[SkillType] (to be implemented later). Implement `app/graphql/types/skill.py` with SkillType. Fields: id, name, slug, category. Use @strawberry.type decorator and proper field types.
acceptance_criteria:
- UserType with all specified fields
- SkillType with all fields
- Field types match GraphQL schema conventions
- Lazy fields use @strawberry.field decorator
- Types can be imported from graphql.types
